title: Baltimore Police Shooting That Wasn't 'Illustrates Malleable Nature Of Memories'
teaser: NPR's Robert Siegel speaks to Elizabeth Loftus, professor of psychology at the University of California, Irvine, about inventing memories. False reports Monday said a man was shot by Baltimore police.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
